metadata.title: CVE-2024-28584 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0[r1909] allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theJ2KImageToFIBITMAP() function when reading images in J2K format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
